SEARCH
Package com.landawn.abacus.util

Class Duration

java.lang.Object
com.landawn.abacus.util.Duration
All Implemented Interfaces:
Immutable, Comparable<Duration>
@Immutable public final class Duration extends Object implements Comparable<Duration>, Immutable
The reason to design/create this class is just to be a bit more efficient than java.time.Duration. It seems that nanoseconds is only used in rare case.
